```{r, eval=FALSE}
# Working Pres/Abs

df_melt_COLD_pres_abs <- df_melt %>% 
  mutate(pres_or_abs = ifelse(Gene_Count ==0, "absent", "present")) %>% filter(Temp == "x_cold") 

  #run without saving to variable to print directly to script window
COLD_pres_abs_heatmap <- df_melt_COLD_pres_abs %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y=Gene, x=Genome))+
  geom_tile(aes(fill= pres_or_abs, color="white"))+
  scale_fill_viridis(discrete=TRUE, direction = -1)+
  theme(legend.position = "right",
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust=1))+
  #coord_fixed()+ #maintains aspect ratio so 1 unit on x is 1 unit on y
    labs(title = "Gene Count",x = "Genome", y = "Gene")
ggsave("COLD_pres_abs_heatmap.png", plot = COLD_pres_abs_heatmap, dpi = 200)
```
